params.loanID: ID of loan from which collateral was withdrawn
params.reward: Value in lending token paid out to liquidator
params.tokensIn: Percentage of the collateral price paid by the liquidator to the lending pool

params.amountPaid: Amount of the loan paid back
params.loanID: ID of loan from which collateral was withdrawn
params.totalOwed: Total amount of the loan to be repaid

escrowRepay(uint256,uint256).details: If the Escrow's balance of the borrowed token is less than the amount to repay, transfer tokens from the sender's wallet.Only the owner of the Escrow can call this. If someone else wants to make a payment, they should call the loan manager directly.

params.loanID: The id of the loan being used.
The loan ID to get the info.

returns.inCollateral_: The value the liquidator will receive denoted in collateral tokens.
returns.inLending_: The value the liquidator will receive denoted in lending tokens.

params.loanID: The ID of the loan to be liquidated

params.amount: The amount of tokens to pay back to the loan
params.loanID: The ID of the loan the payment is for
